text.togenc.config.title: Merge Enchantments Config
text.togenc.config.tooltip.tooltip:
when is true, you can see a tooltip in the item when is enabled
or disabled [default = yes]
text.togenc.config.toggle_hand.tooltip:
put in the list the enchants that you want to toggle in main hand,
only the first enchant in the item list will work

example (in config): you have to put the enchant like this
enchant name;#hex color
-> silk_touch;#00AA00

example (in game): if you have 2 toggle enchants
§dDiamond Pickaxe
§6Mending §fEnabled
§7Mending§f <- in the list, this enchant will toggle
§7Fortune III§f <- in the list but will not work
text.togenc.config.toggle_helmet.tooltip:
put in the list the enchants that you want to toggle in helmet,
only the first enchant in the item list will work

example (in config): you have to put the enchant like this
enchant name;#hex color
-> aqua_affinity;#15557d

example (in game): if you have 2 toggle enchants
§dDiamond Helmet
§bAqua Affinity §fEnabled
§7Aqua Affinity§f <- in the list, this enchant will toggle
§7Protection IV§f <- in the list but will not work
text.togenc.config.toggle_chestplate.too:
put in the list the enchants that you want to toggle chestplate,
only the first enchant in the item list will work

example (in config): you have to put the enchant like this
enchant name;#hex color
-> fire_protection;#bf5f15

example (in game): if you have 2 toggle enchants
§dDiamond Chestplate
§9Protection §fEnabled
§7Protection IV§f <- in the list, this enchant will toggle
§7Thorns III§f <- in the list but will not work
text.togenc.config.toggle_leggings.toolt:
put in the list the enchants that you want to toggle leggings,
only the first enchant in the item list will work

example (in config): you have to put the enchant like this
enchant name;#hex color
-> swift_sneak;#031a2e

example (in game): if you have 2 toggle enchants
§dDiamond Leggings
§2Swift Sneak §fEnabled
§7Swift Sneak III§f <- in the list, this enchant will toggle
§7Protection IV§f <- in the list but will not work
text.togenc.config.toggle_boots.tooltip:
put in the list the enchants that you want to toggle boots,
only the first enchant in the item list will work

example (in config): you have to put the enchant like this
enchant name;#hex color
-> frost_walker;#A5F2F3

example (in game): if you have 2 toggle enchants
§dDiamond Boots
§bFrost Walker §fEnabled
§7Frost Walker II§f <- in the list, this enchant will toggle
§7Soul Speed III§f <- in the list but will not work
key.togenc.title: Merge Enchantments
